about_the_game:
Gameplay


Bimbo Blaster is a fun-action-paced gallery shooter where you feminize evil guys into bimbos!
Try to complete in the endless wave mode and reach the top of the online high score!

You can also customize your own characters and see them transform into a chick!

Features:
-Level mode and endless mode
-Custom character editor
-NSFW version of the gameplay where you can see everyone in their full glory!
-Fun-goofy story intro.

Story

A mysterious alien weapon has been discovered.
They call it ‘The Koro Koro Danjo-Kun.’ It’s a laser gun that changes the sex of its target for an indefinite period of time.
A misogynistic street gang stole the gun and used it to feminize anyone who they deemed not fit as an alpha male, terrorizing the whole city.
I find it ironic that a so-called alpha male needs to feminize others in order to feel more manly..
Now, I’ve been dispatched to give them a taste of their own medicine because I am…
the Bimbo Blaster!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains nudity of men and women.

name: Bimbo Blaster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800H with Radeon Graphics
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB GPU w/ 106 GB/s Bandwidth and DirectX 11 Compliant
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Blasting boys into Bimbos!!! What more info do you need? You blast the boys into busty bimbos! Try not to get hit, or you might end up as one of the bimbos!
